title: What are some websites where I can publish my story? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wattpad is the best suggestion. As of April 2014 statics, 85% of its traffic and usage comes from mobile devices and the site has 35 million unique visitors per month; there are over 100,000 story uploads per day, and there have been over two million writers in it. It's the best place to read and share stories. Readers will review, like and rate your stories there. Most of the users of wattpad are from US. There are many other sites. You can Google to find more.

Wattpad has been mentioned before, but simply because of the size and the volume, your content can get lost there. Other sites to consider are: Scriggler Tablo Upliterate Niume Bloody good Book in India used to offer something similar but not sure if that is still the case.
